Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: /cc ~mastersingh24 - Given you recently did the work to move to dep, just wanted to get your opinion on this one. It looked like you explicitly chose the older version and I'm not sure if there was a reason for it.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: We should be fine to upgrade ... I believe that I chose a specific version as I was trying to deal with some compile errors which I thought were do to the dockerclient but as it turns out were not.
